title: Stratton quits as adviser after party video row
content: The tearful ex-journalist apologised, saying she would "regret the remarks for the rest of my days".

title: Stratton quits as adviser after party video row
content: The tearful ex-journalist apologised, saying she would "regret the remarks for the rest of my days".

title: PM sorry for video after anger about lockdown party
content: Boris Johnson says he was assured no rules were broken, but Labour's Keir Starmer questions the PM's moral authority.

title: Who is Allegra Stratton and why has she quit?
content: A profile of the woman who has resigned over unguarded comments about a No 10 lockdown party in a video.

title: What were the rules on Christmas parties?
content: Any party at Downing Street would have breached the government's guidelines at the time.

title: Scots Tory leader: PM must quit if he misled MPs
content: Scottish Conservative leader Douglas Ross says there was "clearly" a party of some sort in Downing Street last year.

title: MPs earn up to £350 an hour for taking surveys
content: Over 120 politicians did work for polling companies, earning more than £116,000 since the last election.

title: Covid bereaved families 'fuming' at No 10 party
content: Andrew Edwards' mum died alone in hospital with Covid on the day of the party.
